Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.brews

Class SubWindowBrew

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.brews.SubWindowBrew
public class SubWindowBrew extends EventBusPublisher
Manages all auxiliary subwindows (History, Layers, Tools, Settings, About, Help, Changelog).

Listens for UI events and lazily creates, shows, hides, or toggles subwindows while syncing toggle button states and positioning relative to the main stage.
